description: Square array read by antidiagonals of T(n,k)=T(n-1,[k/2])+T(n-1,[k/3]) with T(0,0)=1.
crossrefs: Row sums are 5^n, i.e. A000351. Each row starts with 2^n copies of 2^n, i.e. A000079 and then continues with A036561 copies of other terms in the rows of A055248. Cf. A061929.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, May 22 2001
